name: Grandma’s Batch
description: Grandma’s Batch by Purple Caper Seeds is a cross between Candyland and Girl Scout Cookies. This savory strain emits a sweet gas aroma while tasting sweet and doughy on the palate. The breeder has described the strain as “warm and fuzzy,” offering pleasant and relaxing physical effects suited to a day indoors.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Giggly, Happy, Talkative, Tingly, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
